verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here I am
Down on my knees again
Surrendering all
Surrendering all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Find me here
Lord as You draw me near
Desperate for You
Desperate for You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Drench my soul
As mercy and grace unfold
I hunger and thirst
I hunger and thirst

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
With arms stretched wide
I know You hear my cry
Speak to me now
Speak to me now

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I surrender
I surrender
I want to know You more
I want to know You more

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Like a rushing wind
Jesus breathe within
Lord have Your way
Lord have Your way in me

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Like a mighty storm
Stir within my soul
Lord have Your way
Lord have Your way in me
